channel.title: Basics on Project Documentations
channel.description: Recent content in Basics on Project Documentations

item.title: Requirements
item.description: Minimun requirements: Untested Recommended specs: TBD Tested devices: Show/Close Dev rig: CPU: Ryzen 5600 GPU: RTX 3060ti RAM: 32GB Test rigs: CPU: 6500 GPU: rtx 3050 FPS: Smooth CPU: i5 6600 GPU: gtx 960 RAM: 16GB FPS: insufficient GPU vram CPU: i5 4590 GPU: intel HD graphics 4600 RAM: 8GB FPS: Unplayable Feel free to contact me at alex01763@gmail.com with your specs and fps so that I can improve this page.

item.title: Installation
item.description: You need Steam and Epic games store installed and logged in before starting. This will not be required after official release. You can download the zip files on https://dl.whatthesamuel.com(Important! The email security code is a Cloudflare feature. I don’t collect any data). I recommend you download the latest version by looking at the dates next to the file names File names: Windows_debug_game.zip : game compiled with ‘debug’ setting in unreal. Steam login Windows_debug_game_accportal.

item.title: Playing multiplayer
item.description: Currently, I’m having some issues with EOS working with steam, so meanwhile, here is a temporary workaround. Install and set up Hamachi(or similar custom vpns, but Hamachi is easy to use) Set up a server in Hamachi and connect to the host(up to 5 people) copy the IPv4 address Open the command prompt(press windows key and search for ‘command’) and enter the following command: <game location> <ipv4 address> -log (replace the game location and ipv4 address with your appropriate environment)

item.title: Instructions
item.description: How to play Controls W, S, A, D to move Space to jump Move mouse to look around Left click to shoot Right click to aim(zoom in) Esc to open menu, etc… How to exit press esc-> exit How to show FPS counter (for contributing & reporting) press ` key to open console type stat fps and press enter FPS counter should appear on right side of screen How to play multiplayer

item.title: Configuration
item.description: Go to ‘Options’ in the main menu and change the settings as you like.

item.title: Patch Notes
item.description: 04/05/2023: Docs - Initial commit 04/08/2023: Docs - Updated requirements 04/09/2023: Update #1 on dev build - “should” fix EOS networking problem 04/22/2023: Update #2 on dev build - fixed camera and gun positions, minor fixes and performance improvements Docs - add instructions 05/06/2023: Update #3 on dev build - fixed client UI bugs, added ragdoll on death, much more major bug fixes, changed animations Docs - add multiplayer instructions
